chess

Class Knight

  • java.lang.Object
    • chess.Piece
      • chess.Knight

  • public class Knight
extends Piece
    The Knight class represents a knight object
    Author:
    Justin Saganowski, Emily Tregelles

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class chess.Piece

        color, currentTile, first_move, pieceType, tag

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isValidPath(Tile start, Tile end)
      The isValidPath method checks if the knight is moving in an L-shape if file increases/decreases by 1 and rank increases/decreases by 2 or if file increases/decreases by 2 and rank increases/decreases by 1 the move is valid (L-shaped)
      boolean move_check(Tile end)
      The move_check method determines if a move is legal
      void move(Tile end)
      The move method checks if it is a valid move and that the end tile is currently reachable by the piece.
      Tile[] possibleMove()
      The possibleMove method determines which locations on the board can be legally reached by the piece
      boolean validOutOfCheck(Tile end_tile)
      The validOutOfCheck method checks if moving a king to the specified tile will successfully get it out of check

      • move

        public void move(Tile end)
